burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa

Class FunctionWeight

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.FunctionWeight

  • public class FunctionWeight
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the weight value for weights defined by a ValueFunctionApproximation class. It is expected that when a weight value is changed on this object that the corresponding weight value in the ValueFunctionApproximation object is changed as well, which means the ValueFunctionApproximation should store its weights with this data structure. Alternative, the ValueFunctionApproximation class can use a different data structure and subclass this FunctionWeight class so that when the setWeight method is called on it, it also updates the corresponding data structure in the ValueFunctionApproximation object.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
